title: Scoreboard

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Scoreboard is a piece of scenery that shows points related to competitive activities such as Minigames. The following scoreboards can be found:

content:
A Scoreboard is a piece of scenery that shows points related to competitive activities such as Minigames. The following scoreboards can be found:

  • Scoreboard (Ancient Prison)
  • Scoreboard (Castle Wars)
  • Scoreboard (Duel Arena)
  • Scoreboard (Last Man Standing)
  • Scoreboard (Phosani's Nightmare)
  • Scoreboard (Theatre of Blood)
  • Scoreboard (The Gauntlet)
  • Scoreboard (The Nightmare)
  • Scoreboard (Soul Wars)
  • Scoreboard (TzHaar-Ket-Rak)
  • Score board (Pest Control)
  • Score board (Chambers of Xeric)

Besides these, there are some interactive scenery objects with a similar function:

  • Noticeboard (Hallowed sepulchre)
  • Wilderness statistics
  • Streak info
  • Shooting Star Noticeboard
  • Gravestone (Tree Gnome Stronghold)

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Notice board
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
A '''Scoreboard''' is a piece of scenery that shows points related to competitive activities such as [[Minigame]]s. The following scoreboards can be found:
* [[Scoreboard (Ancient Prison)]]
* [[Scoreboard (Castle Wars)]]
* [[Scoreboard (Duel Arena)]]
* [[Scoreboard (Last Man Standing)]]
* [[Scoreboard (Phosani's Nightmare)]]
* [[Scoreboard (Theatre of Blood)]]
* [[Scoreboard (The Gauntlet)]]
* [[Scoreboard (The Nightmare)]]
* [[Scoreboard (Soul Wars)]]
* [[Scoreboard (TzHaar-Ket-Rak)]]
* [[Score board (Pest Control)]]
* [[Score board (Chambers of Xeric)]]
Besides these, there are some interactive scenery objects with a similar function:
*[[Noticeboard (Hallowed Sepulchre)|Noticeboard (Hallowed sepulchre)]]
*[[Wilderness statistics]]
* [[Streak info]]
* [[Shooting Star Noticeboard]]
* [[Gravestone (Tree Gnome Stronghold)]]

===See also===
* [[Notice board]]

{{Disambig}}
